post.body: they're starting early, huh!? i havent heard anything in my neighborhood YET! all old farts! :)
Thanks for the follow! Looking forward to the upcoming festival!
Thanks for the follow! and i'll keep that in mind if and when i ever travel to japan!
I have yet to taste authentic japanese noodles from japan.. i've heard good suggestions on the best ramen joints here on twitter!
Thanks for the follow! Go warriors!
Ah, bets are always good motivation... where are you working out? Sometimes, it's good to just get out and hike or go to the park!
I need to head back to the gym too... maybe we should all go after work or something... might be more motivating.
I like udon noodles! but i think my favorite is plain ol' ramen noodles!
yo!
hope you feel better!
I feel you there, dude!
sweet discount! thanks! RT erikaengle Fight fans! Get a $20 rebate on De La Hoya/Pacquiao fight on HBO PPV! http://is.gd/9Vzx
Pandora rocks! I stream from my iphone through my radio while on the road!
Sweet! in LA I presume? Im all the way out here in Hawaii. The trailer looked great! Theatrical release or straight to blu-ray?
I might check out the concert. We'll see!
What kind of work do you do? Authoring? Post work?
Wow! awesome stuff! What did you folks shoot on? Film? Red?
please elaborate. anytime i hear the words "ax" and "falling" in the same sentence from someone in the same building as me-i worry
this tweet is useless without twitpics!
*cringes at the thought of bacon/garlic ice cream*
You're starting to worry me, Rod... first, manscara and guyliner, talk about metrosexuality and now this... :-|
Let us know how you like the hele! I'm using an ATT 3G datacard and it works great, but i'm paying about 50 bucks a month.
hmm... bacon ice cream, huh? i love bacon, but not sure i love it THAT much... :-) hehe
Twitter is one of the few websites out there that have absolutely no advertisements on profile pages... that would be 1 way.
diet coke?
hehe yeps. What software/hardware are you using for color correction? Any tips on what/how to correctly color correct? Websites?
hmm, thanks for the input! Since I sold the HVXs all I have is my DVX... I LOVE my Panasonics, but will def. check out the sony.
Nice. I used to have a couple HVXs. I sold them. I'm debating weather to save for something like red or grab another HVX + RRM.
What kind of footage are you correcting? SD DVCRPRO50?
No sweat! It's on my server... I'm not even using a fraction of the 100GB transfer. I think you're the largest acct @ like 6gb
Yoo! Doing good dude. Super busy, just concentrating on keeping a job!! haha. We do need to chill soon. Hows the film doing?
Sade does rule! Smooth Operator just played on Pandora! Good stuff.
Yeah, pee lyrics and everything! haha
Whoa, he dropped a new album? Cool. Anything good? Is he rapping now, ala r-kelly? heheh
haha. KSSK!? Da-da daa da da da da dada
Ah yep. Gerard was always a cool homie. What company are you with? I was looking at the spot downstairs by the waterfall... :-)
Good night, dude!
Ah cool. Is Gerard still @ shooters? You must be in the Times building? I was looking at a space there back when I was freelancing
Thanks for the add! I'm John, by the way. Nice to meet you!
I agree! Cool stuff there!
how's SF Gary? Hope you're having a great trip dude!
good to know. Ill park up there!
yep, they're moving again. One of the ladies there said she's having surgery and they're closing until she comes back.
cool. Is ala moana packed? Parking must be nuts!
search.twitter.com is a doozie! Etched in intarnet history!! Hehe
haha you'd buy it, don't lie! LOL
bwahaha does your wife and kids know how you tweet!? Haha
you aren't the marketing manager for nothing!!! Monetize!! Hehe
@melissa808 @parkrat you 3 are a riot!!! Double dogging fat boys and lessons on how to be a real woman... Nice! LOL
twitpic please. Kthx! :)
ahahahaha yeah, slower
wow that was one of the most erotic tweete I've read in a while
I think it all comes down to burning minutes. Those extra seconds spent learning how to leave a VM add up to $ for phone comps
hahaah... i feel you dude. i'm always re-wording AND trying to avoid using b4, 2 and ur.
if not, tow 'em! :-)
i'm guessing jets arent doing too well?
ah that sucks. i've had good experiences with online to store pickup. :-/
ahaha good stuff. I'll DM you re: ukulele underground.
ahaha, so, basically, you were high on some drugs!! Sure that wasnt the 70s? Haha hope you feel better dude!
Thanks for the add! That green layout is pretty clean!
It's pretty awesome for you folks to be on Twitter. Get some of the players up on here!
Hey, Melissa! I sent you and @jlieu an email eariler, let me know if you got it!! :) Thanks!
let me know when you're live!
Yeah, I think that's a good idea. Take it a step further and strum your uke while you're at it. Engage that ukulele audience!
O RLY!?
word to that! superstars!
oh no, to move YOUR stuff!? or just other stuff?
Kobe hotdog sounds good!! Getting hungry! :-(
ahahaha... rIGHt, haha. hey, i'm back at work tomorrow. how's things going?
good flight?! hope you have a blast in paris, dude!
You need 16GB because 1, it's cool to have the top of the line, 2, you never know when you'll need it and 3, 16 is more than 8.
Cool stuff, dude! Moglus can be a bit finicky sometimes, but overall, it's a pretty solid streaming video platform!
thanks for the follow!
congrats on 8k!
hey monchalee! i'm working on it!!! i'll let you know as soon as it's done!
whooo good one, GARY! Very true. Working in the newspaper industry, this is a scary thought — we need to embrace social media!!!
ahaha good one!
chee whoo! Twitpic your location bro!
you need to be somewhat interesting in order to get followers, you know. tweet something! haha!
oh yeah, like just black olives... it probably wasnt even 120, she insists it was only like 40 or 50 olives :-) haha still though.
yeah, i think i'm okay. you know, you dont really think of olives as being very oily, but eat enough and you'll change your mind
ahaha, my girlfriend brought a veggie platter home and she was packing the veggies away, so i just started scarfing down the olives
yeah, his whiskers are pretty gnarly!
bottoms up!
riiiiite ;)
Yoo!! MC Hammer!! What's up, dude!? Cool to see you on Twitter!
Thanks for all of the great tweets on discounts and coupons from @alamoanactr !
what's your movie about dude? Tell us about it!
you would make a killing with a twitter addiciton hotline, dude!!
I'll be tweeting the heck out of the marathon, so Youll know all about it! Good night!
where you heading to? Hope you have fun!! bummed about tonight, but we'll meet sooner or later! Stay dry!
thanks dude! So here I am, upstairs, in bed, ON TWITTER!! LOL.
Thanks for the add! Just read your latest tweet... pretty exciting to be on set! Good luck!
cool. who's shooting with me @ the starting line? bt?
ehh. im done for now. heading in at around midnight to take care of some site cleanup then head down to the starting line.
live tweet your run!! live tweet your run!! :-) have a great night's rest and best of luck/stay dry tomorrow!
nice. at least 3 people on twitter are ballin' on 99 cent ramen packs tonight. :)
Turn em' on to @garyvee!
I did a set but have to redo it. Got the work order now and sending shortly.
DO IT! Next time we're on AIM you can tell me all about it.
have fun, Ben! Drove safe out there dude!
yes. It's called the "hawaiian" - pinapple teri burger with fries. It's about $11.00.
haha thata way to justify their mess up. Hehe nah it's cool tasted good and our server, teri was pretty awesome. Big tip.
islands burgers and fine drinks in @alamoanacenter.
that's awesome. I want to start a hydroponic garden.
what did you buy, dude!!?? Any new toys?
Whoa, the dude that was always sitting there slumped over? Ahh rest in peace dude.
cool, thanks for the tip, Lee!
ah yeah, it's nuts! Have a nice evening!
haha... yeah, I grew up with thier music... KSSK! ahaha
Ahhh, the life of a webmaster. :-) haha... have fun! I'm still at work too... Leaving in about an hour.
Where you at!?
suspicious...
oh, of course, you're more than enough! :-p hehe Maybe i'll stop by! :)
who else is going to the brewmoon tweet-up tomorrow!?
sounds like a plan then. need to scout some locations and do some pre-production for lighting/set ideas.
you tell us!! :-)
awesome. will check it out. :-)
any hunches on how the minis would change?
cool. so, name a few of the crazier dice-made-decisions that you've had to make...
hey, i see you have a photo-a-day project going on as well!? awesome!
whoo, yep, small island! hello there, @carollyan!
did you seriously just roll a dice on that one? cool! :-) haha... i should try that.
i'll keep that in mind next time i'm looking for sushi. thanks for the heads up!
so what will be the new toy at the next macworld?
roll a dice and make a decision! ;) :-)
cool. hulu rocks. i need to hack my apple tv so i can watch hulu on it!
is awesomesauce the hashtag of the week? i'm starting to see it all over the place, particuarly tonight. lol.
I sure am. :-)
whooo getting tired. i think i'm going to bed shortly.
whoo long day. finally got home from the newsroom — i'd like to start editing some video, but i'd rather chill tonight. hows everyone doing?
Eating dinner. Heading back to the office shortly.
Building a christmas flash creative and listening to christmas music via pandora.
I don't think i'd every get sick of a good somen salad. I dunno what it is, but I really love noodles.
Eating a somen salad and watermelon.
gonna warm up my home lunch. trying to save money, especially with axes falling and everything.
darn... after reading the recipe... it's kinda like a scoop of frozen white garlic sauce or garlic gravy!
In lieu of all the garlic ice cream talk going on today, here's a recipe so you can try it for yourself: http://bit.ly/aHFR
building another RSS feed for @honadv
eating hilo creme crackers
whoops! live stream is done!
getting ready to do a live video stream via mogulus with @fpizarro
ahh... kinda over xmas music for now... changing it up a bit.
phew.... super groggy. Davvveee where are you dude!?
UP. Waiting for Dave Hisaka to arrive @ the traffic management center. Check out www.honoluluadvertiser.com for live streaming traffic video
Heading to bed. Up at 5am to help Dave Hisaka broadcast live streaming video traffic reports on www.honoluluadvertiser.com. Check it out!
Whoa, PM Dawn - Die without you.
Excellent. You don't happen to have it in Blu-Ray, do you? Would love to watch it in HD!!
Whoa, haven't heard Seal for a while...
Are you ready for some football!!?? http://twitpic.com/qsvi
Spicy ahi poke, edamame, kulolo and hanalei poi for the game! http://twitpic.com/qsu5
Car is done. Capones did a good job!! Check them out in the garage at ward center! http://twitpic.com/qryr
Do people generally tip you car detailer?
Just left the place, ward center. 25% off everything! Moving sale. http://twitpic.com/qr6s
Just met w/coleen from island building supply for cabinets and granite for the new house. Heres what were feeling: http://twitpic.com/qqyj
At Hawaii kai shopping ctr. Parked in front of city mill. Here's a twit-plug for city mill Hawaii kai. http://twitpic.com/r1rr
Just updated our house project on www.rsvpstyle.com — http://bit.ly/C9Ts Added a new 3d rendering of the kitchen/living room!
Heading out shortly. Going to do some shopping and heading to the hopspital to visit my uncle.
ahaha wth... i'm watching SNL now and they're singing about jizzing in your pants. that must be breaking some kind of cable tv rule!? haha!
ahahaha gas right posterior strips... classic.
ahahaha. watching SNL reruns.
Today is a December 7th. RIP to the men and women who lost their lives to defend their country.
Damn. Today's sears book is a weapon!
My weekly Sunday inserts ritual begins. Best buy is always first. What's your favorite ad/insert on Sunday morning?
Just woke up! That was an excellent sleep!
Who's watching "Madden Nation" — pretty interesting! I suck at Madden!
I think we need to see the post game on this one.
drinking a cup of tea and waiting for an email response.
whoo, getting things cleaned up and out! working on a couple creatives, cleanup and a special project for launch this weekend!
Back at work after 2 vacation days and the weekend! Gotta tackle the rest of the week head first!
Ahhh it's a brand new day! Have a good one, folks!!
Morning everyone — last day of vacation — back to work tomorrow. Chilling at home on the net reading blogs, studying social media, thinking
Note to self: get a cool looking umbrella. A 6'1 270 lbs. dude holding a tiny neon aqua umbrella is not exactly awesome.
Whoa! Crazy rain at queen and south streets!! http://twitpic.com/ry7o
Hawaiian style car wash cuz... http://twitpic.com/ry2x
Traffic lights out @ beretania and university. Officer directing 6 way traffic. At the city & county traffic management ctr, Im john Garcia
Morning everyone! Stay dry today!!!
follow @honadvtraffic for live traffic report tweets from dave hisaka at the city's traffic management center.
whoa! i wake up and traffic/weather/rain is absolutely nuts! hitting up dave hisaka to get an inside scoop.
Working on some graphics here in photoshop then I need to revise some of the house lighting schematics for the contractor. Change orders!
I just ate like 120 olives. Feeling a little queezy now.
Turning into the advertiser lot.
Taking vineyard off. It's pouring!
Just passed hawaiian ice trucks. That's some serious ice!! Thanks @jamesku!
Roads look clean this morning. Crews are setting up: http://twitpic.com/srp4
On my way to the newsroom! It's wet out here!
Rain is picking up in Hawaii kai!
going to get a couple hours of shut-eye then heading to the honolulu advertiser newsroom for some site cleanup then to the starting line!
What's up with all the guys wearing affliction shirts? Fad?
I give Islands Fine Burgers and Drinks a 3.7 out of 5 stars. Reasonable price, good taste and excellent service.
Here's the "rincon" burger - guac bacon, Swiss, lettuce tomatoes. I asked for a white bun and they gave me wheat http://twitpic.com/uhkj
Islands tortilla chips and salsa with guacamole. http://twitpic.com/uhbt
Getting seated now. 30 minute wait. Hmmm burger, taco or salad?
Waiting in line for a table at islands fine burgers and drinks. This may be a good place for the @mydaypass burger challenge!? Thoughts?
At @alamoanacenter mad house here! Finishing my Xmas shopping. How much did you spend this year on Christmas?
bacon?
going upstairs to edit. lots to do! almost done with the documentary!
what is everyone up to tomorrow? I may do 1 of 3 things: round the island cruise, hiking or hit up the zoo/aquarium for my photo of the day.
Eating apple sauce.
